php.LBL_FILL_EMPTY: Vul in (werk alleen lege velden in het record bij, wijzig bestaande waarden niet)
php.LBL_IMPORT_STEP_3_DESCRIPTION_DETAILED: Selecteer deze optie om dubbelen samen te voegen en criteria in te stellen
php.LBL_SPECIFY_MERGE_TYPE: Selecteer hoe dubbele records moeten worden verwerkt
php.LBL_SELECT_MERGE_FIELDS: Selecteer de overeenkomende velden om dubbele records te vinden
php.LBL_IMPORT_STEP_4_DESCRIPTION: Map the Columns to Module Fields
php.ERR_UNIMPORTED_RECORDS_EXIST: Het is niet mogelijk om meer gegevens in deze bacht te importeren. Start a.u.b. een nieuwe import.
php.ERR_IMPORT_INTERRUPTED: Current Import has been interrupted. Please try again later
php.ERR_FAILED_TO_LOCK_MODULE: Kan de module niet vergrendelen om te importeren. Probeer het later opnieuw
php.LBL_SCHEDULED_IMPORT_DETAILS:
Your import has been scheduled and will start within 15 minutes. You will receive an email after import is completed.

Please make sure that the Outgoing server and your email address is configured to receive email notification
php.LBL_MERGE_TYPE_INFO:
Skip: exisitng records are skipped and not updated.

Overwrite: existing recorda are overwritten with data from file or default values are filled in if required values in record and file are empty. If not marked as required, values are overwritten in the record with empty values from the file. 

Merge: record values are overwritten with values from the file if values from the file are not empty (however, if they are empty, values from the record are kept). 

Fill in: only empty fields in the record are updated. Values from the field are not overwritten if there is already an exisitng value in the record.
php.LBL_IMPORT_FILE_DIFFERENT_ENCODING: Het geïmporteerde bestand is in een andere codering dan het geselecteerde (%s)
